Reviews.Title: Simply does the job!
Reviews.Author: Blake McJunkin
Reviews.Content: This contact works great for my home garage door.  It works like any magnetic electrical contact except it has a much greater tolerance on spacing.  The magnet supplied will close the contact from over 2 inches away.  This makes up for any variations in the door position.  I opted to mount mine at the top of my garage door rather than the floor and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Works well with DSC PC1864
Reviews.Author: Doug Deep
Reviews.Content: I set this up with my DSC PC1864, NC wiring, no EOL resistors. Works well enough. It does as it says and works with a few inch gap. I too put this at the top of my garage door instead of the bottom.

Reviews.Title: Hi quality
Reviews.Author: B. Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I used this as a normally closed switch, mounted in-line with my garage door circuit to keep the door from opening whenever the attic pull down ladder is open.  This is a very rugged switch and offers a wider range than a smaller reed switch.  I figure I was on borrowed time before one of the kids pressed the opener button while I had the ladder down!

Reviews.Title: Works great with garage door
Reviews.Author: Brent R. Blackburn "WYY551"
Reviews.Content: Works great with garage door and is cheap/easy way to know if the door is closed or not.  I use this over a Total COnnect 2.0 service on my iphone to make sure no contact points are open while I'm away.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: RUSSELL D BRANTLEY
Reviews.Content: Outstanding just what I needed does everything I need it to do. Arrived quick and on time the best service many thanks.

Reviews.Title: Adding Garage Doors to Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Onfus
Reviews.Content: I wanted to have an indicator inside the house that would tell me if the garage doors are closed.  They sell items specifically for that that mount to the door and transmit to an unit plugged somewhere inside the house.  But I did not want to have yet another gadget.  So I hooked two of these to my alarm system  and now not only I know if there is a garage door open, I know which one (I have an alpha-numeric display).  Also now my garage is protected by the security system all these for less than half  the cost of the single stand-alone  garage door monitor.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Stephen Sanislo Jr. "Steve Two"
Reviews.Content: I took a star off because the 'Honeywell' name is prominently molded into the metal case. For independent installers, Honeywell is both a supplier and a competitor. It doesn't make sense to promote your competitor inside of your customer's home or business.

ProductInfo.Features:
Can be added to a wireless home security system with video surveillance cameras and more
Adjustable magnet with L bracket for fast installation 24 in.
24 in. Armored cable is standard Standard gap -- 2-3/8 in.
Epoxy sealed for protection from moisture and impact.
Rugged Shock Absorber design protects reed against flex or damage to housing.
ProductInfo.Name: Honeywell Ademco 958 Overhead Door Contacts
